ygData.msgSnippet: Dracona walks up to the Predacon (Megatron s) base and looks at it. It didn t notice her, so she went closer and inspected it. She looked around it, making

Dracona walks up to the Predacon (Megatron's) base and looks at it. It didn=
't notice her, so she went closer and inspected it. She looked around it, m=
aking notes of certain things.

Plintissa followed Artist out in the missle=
 of no where in a desert. Artist turned around and looked at Plintissa.

"P=
lintissa now see Artist's secret treasure!" Artist said. He smiled. Plintis=
sa was stunned. Artist dug a little in the sand, and brought up a hermit cr=
ab shell. Artist laughed and ran off laughing giddily. Plintissa sighed and=
 turned back. No wait, maybe this way was back. No wait, that way. Plintiss=
a realized she was lost, and that Artist was nowhere to be found. She looke=
d around from left to right. Oh, what was the use, she might as well be dea=
d out on the desert anyhow, she obviously wasn't needed, not even Dracona s=
tuck around with her! She had thought that Iron Raptor was her friend, but =
that blew up in her face. Then she made the mistake of trusting some bot sh=
o said he would help her, and then she went off and nobody trusted her any =
longer. Plintissa walked off into the distance, hoping to find her way home=
. Then it occured to her. She didn't have a home. a single tear fell from P=
lintissa's eye and she walked on.

Artist ran off into the distance and loo=
ked back joyfully. Plintissa wasn't there.

"Yikes! I was supposed to prote=
ct her!" Artist said. He ran back into the desert, darting quickly mile for=
 mile, trying to find Plintissa.

Gangon's spark glowed eerily and bumped i=
nto BrightBlade's hand.

Sinesis and Sinister lay there, half dead with Sin=
ister in pieces.

Deemos figures out that this disgusting team must not be =
right for him and he runs off, hoping maybe the Maximals would be good enou=
gh to let him and his wife join and heal up. He ran along, going quickly, a=
bout 2 hours later he found the Maximal base. Inzola was in his arms in sta=
sis lock and spitting out blood, she was bleeding internally. Deemos whimpe=
red and aproached the Maximal base.

"Attention! Maximals! I wish to join y=
ou, as does my wife and cohort, Inzola! Let me it, Inzola is in critical co=
ndition!" Deemos said.

The Radicons ceased their walk and sat down in a fo=
rest. Airbomber sighed.

"Food would be good about now." Train Wreck said. =
Arrow smiled.

"Wait here, I'll go get something!" Arrow said. He went runn=
ing off. Blender and Stronghold shrugged, Stronghold staring into the dista=
nce and Blender scanning the area. Stranato and Train Wreck look at each ot=
her and gulp. Arrow must be their chef now.

"I hope you like what Arrow ma=
kes." Airbomber said to Infectra. (If she's there.)
